limit_mib.description: MemoryLimitMiB is the maximum amount of memory, in MiB, targeted to be allocated by the process.

limit_percentage.description: MemoryLimitPercentage is the maximum amount of memory, in %, targeted to be allocated by the process. The fixed memory settings MemoryLimitMiB has a higher precedence.

spike_limit_mib.description: MemorySpikeLimitMiB is the maximum, in MiB, spike expected between the measurements of memory usage.

spike_limit_percentage.description: MemorySpikePercentage is the maximum, in percents against the total memory, spike expected between the measurements of memory usage.
